English: Examination Yuan, the qualification and appointment board under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan

d.f: `我國~`中央政府~`五院~`之~`一~，`為~`全國~`最~`高~`的~`考試~`機關~。`掌理~`公務人員~`的~`考試~、`銓敘~、`保障~、`撫卹~、`退休~、`任免~、`考~`綪~、`級~`俸~、`陞~`遷~、`褒獎~`等~`事項~；`分~`設~`考選~、`銓敘~`兩~`部~`及~`公務人員~`保障~`暨~`培訓~`委員會~、`公務人員~`退休~`撫卹~`基金~`監~`理~`委員會~`等~。

English: Examination Yuan, the qualification and appointment board under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan
